Articles.Content:
You're about to make a choice that will alter the course of your life, a choice between two superpowers. One lets you summon a Balrog to assist you in dire situations, and the other makes tumbleweed pass by at a distance of your choosing - reaching far back in time and altering the local bush history make it so.

Consider all implications when you make your choice. You cannot change it at any time, so choose wisely. Or else you will regret it. I am not joking. This is for real. Make your choice now. This is an opportunity you don't want to miss.
